diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Emphysematous cholecystitis, Acute pulmonary embolism, Subacute subdural hematoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with lethargy and was found to have a subacute subdural hematoma, alongside imaging findings suggestive of emphysematous cholecystitis and acute pulmonary embolism. Neurological assessment revealed increased lethargy and imaging showed a stable appearance of the previously characterized subdural hematoma. Other laboratory and imaging findings raised concerns for possible pneumonia.
